pullRequest.body:
Fixed `AlgebraicGeometry/AffineSchemes.lean`, `AlgebraicGeometry/Morphisms/QuasiSeparated.lean` and  `AlgebraicGeometry/Morphisms/RingHomProperties.lean`.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

[![Open in Gitpod](https://gitpod.io/button/open-in-gitpod.svg)](https://gitpod.io/from-referrer/)

nodes.body: Note: I have pushed an update to the lean toolchain because this PR was on a [buggy version](https://leanprover.zulipchat.com/#narrow/stream/113488-general/topic/Potential.20data.20loss.20from.20.60lake.20clean.60.20with.204.2E2.2E0-rc2.2F3/near/397875701) of the toolchain. **WARNING**: checking out old commits of this PR using v4.2.0-rc2 or v4.2.0-rc3 can cause `lake clean` to delete your mathlib folder! If you need to do so, make sure to delete `lakefile.olean` manually before running any `lake` commands.
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/afdc07a2-8aeb-4c4f-afe8-f5706d709db8) for commit 4da60031f4f26d2532fa6b0adb2531f8f4143908.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/0d9ca3f5-d70d-4b14-8ff6-e63658011ab5/to/afdc07a2-8aeb-4c4f-afe8-f5706d709db8) against commit 0ca6e0291c787f67bf360c2201f292f793fb5357:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                Metric             Change
  ==================================================================================
+ build                                                    maxrss             -20.9%
+ build                                                    tactic execution    -7.5%
+ lint                                                     instructions        -5.4%
+ lint                                                     wall-clock          -5.1%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.AffineScheme                  instructions       -83.8%
- ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.GammaSpecAdjunction           instructions         8.4%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Morphisms.QuasiSeparated      instructions       -75.8%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Morphisms.RingHomProperties   instructions       -72.6%
- ~Mathlib.Topology.Sheaves.SheafCondition.UniqueGluing    instructions        37.4%
```
@erdOne This seems like an improvement! Would you mind fixing the build please?

@erdOne Feel free to revert my hacky 42a9855 as part of this (much better) PR, or ping me if you want me to do the revert instead. I didn't know of this PR before.

Edit: I ended up just reverting it myself to save you the trouble, hopefully that's not a problem. Feel free to force push your local copy if it conflicts with any changes you might have.

> @erdOne This seems like an improvement! Would you mind fixing the build please?

@jcommelin The build failure was just a "no space left on device error". I triggered a rebuild and it was green.
@collares Thanks for the fix!
!bench

Here are the [benchmark results](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/run-detail/5f0d46a3-95bc-405c-90af-debed45565c5) for commit 55c54debfe43603403cdcb5b325692c59aca341d.
There were [significant changes](http://speed.lean-fro.org/mathlib4/compare/33748cbb-09a2-4ea1-84a1-f81cccc8488a/to/5f0d46a3-95bc-405c-90af-debed45565c5) against commit daf40d2c6329d7aebe1552da03c5034bcdeb5505:
```diff
  Benchmark                                                Metric         Change
  ==============================================================================
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.AffineScheme                  instructions   -84.4%
- ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.GammaSpecAdjunction           instructions     8.5%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Morphisms.QuasiSeparated      instructions   -75.3%
+ ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Morphisms.RingHomProperties   instructions   -24.2%
- ~Mathlib.AlgebraicGeometry.Restrict                      instructions     5.1%
- ~Mathlib.Topology.Sheaves.SheafCondition.UniqueGluing    instructions    51.0%
```

(Note: the three files becoming slower is due to new lemmas added to those files. - Junyan)
bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6843291836/job/18605723690)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6843291836/job/18605723800)
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/6843291836/job/18605723915)

```suggestion [CommSemiring S] [Algebra R S] [IsLocalization M S] : ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:

```suggestion U.openEmbedding.isOpenMap.functor.obj ((X ∣_ᵤ U).basicOpen r) = X.basicOpen ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion U.openEmbedding.isOpenMap.functor.obj ((X ∣_ᵤ U).basicOpen r) = X.basicOpen r := by ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion U.openEmbedding.isOpenMap.functor.obj ((X ∣_ᵤ U).basicOpen <| ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion hU.fromSpec.1.c.app (op U) = SpecΓIdentity.inv.app (X.presheaf.obj <| op U) ≫ ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion (X.ofRestrict U.openEmbedding).1.c.app (op U) = X.presheaf.map (eqToHom (by simp)).op := rfl ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion (e : U.openEmbedding.isOpenMap.functor.obj V = U.openEmbedding.isOpenMap.functor.obj W) : ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion (Localization.algEquiv M S : Localization M →+* S) = ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion ((Localization.algEquiv M S).symm : S →+* Localization M) = ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion (F : X.Presheaf CommRingCat) {U₁ U₂ U₃ U₄ U₅ U₆ U₇ : Opens X} {n₁ n₂ : ℕ} ```

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - perf(AlgebraicGeometry): Fix slow and bad proofs
